Room.Name: Secret Passage
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a short, secret passage connecting to a large room to the north.
Room.LongDescription: The large room to the north appears to be the source of all the chanting. Peeking through the keyhole, you can make out at least six skeletons and a couple of skeletal warriors. The door to the north is locked with what looks like a bone lock, which is not easily pickable.
